content: [Dialogue Intro 5-7 Bond Level 4]
info: 通用引入语-1005幻雪_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
{R开心}<color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>!
Did you come specially to see me?
info: 通用引入语-1005幻雪_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
In my view, unknown and novel things are all wonderful!
...
{R笑眯眯}That's not the reason why I'm staring at you, mind you.
info: 通用引入语-1005幻雪_特殊反馈及引入语

content: [First Outdoor Dialogue Introduction - Bond Level 4]
info: 通用引入语-1005幻雪_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
{R笑眯眯}Ah, good evening, <color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>! {R开心}
Time seems to have flown by particularly quickly today.
info: 通用引入语-1005幻雪_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
{R开心}So, did something interesting happen?
Would you like to share it with me?
info: 通用引入语-1005幻雪_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
{R开心}Every time I meet you,
The phrase "serendipitous encounter" automatically appears in my mind...
How mysteriously delightful~ yeep!
info: 通用引入语-1005幻雪_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
{R打招呼}Hello there! I hope everything's going well?
If things aren't quite as you expected,
Perhaps fate has different plans in store~
info: 通用引入语-1005幻雪_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
{R打招呼}I'm delighted to meet you,
Even though I've lost count of how many times that makes today,
{R笑眯眯}Doesn't that make it all the more mysterious~?
info: 通用引入语-1005幻雪_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
{R开心}Don't worry, I quite enjoy when you come by to say hello.
Feel free to visit anytime~ There's always a touch of mystery in the air.
info: 通用引入语-1005幻雪_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
{R笑眯眯}<color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>, yeep~ We meet again!
Oh dear, I've lost count of my previous calculations...
I was just trying to keep track of how many times we've crossed paths today.
info: 通用引入语-1005幻雪_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
{R思考}I'm calculating how many times we've met today,
One plus two plus one equals... three?
{短暂停}Why was I calculating this again?
info: 通用引入语-1005幻雪_特殊反馈及引入语

content: [Bond Level 4 Dialogue - Less than 4 conversations]
info: 通用引入语-1005幻雪_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
Yeep~{R笑眯眯}Hello there, 
<color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>!
How has your day been?
info: 通用引入语-1005幻雪_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
{R笑眯眯}Yee~ We seem to have run into each other quite frequently today.
I see now... perhaps these weren't mere coincidences?
info: 通用引入语-1005幻雪_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
{R笑眯眯}Good afternoon, <color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>
The way you were hurrying past just now made me think,
What a wonderfully vibrant afternoon this is, {PetPhrase}.
info: 通用引入语-1005幻雪_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
{R笑眯眯}Hello, <color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>,
Have you made any fascinating discoveries today?
info: 通用引入语-1005幻雪_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
{R开心}Yeep~ You seem to enjoy greeting me quite often,
Oh no, it's not an issue at all,
Quite the contrary, I'm delighted~.

content: [Dialogue introduction for less than 4 conversations - Bond Level 34-2]
info: 通用引入语-1005幻雪_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
<color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>, {R思考}
Is it just my imagination?
Have I encountered you multiple times today?
info: 通用引入语-1005幻雪_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
{R笑眯眯}Good morning!
The first ray of sunlight upon my body,
Like charging up for the new day ahead.
info: 通用引入语-1005幻雪_特殊反馈及引入语

content:
{R笑眯眯}Do you enjoy afternoon naps?
As for me? I'm quite the night owl, you see~
For me, noon is when everything truly begins.
